title: React + Vite Template
subtitle: A comprehensive starter template with modern tooling
description: This is a production-ready template built with modern web technologies. It includes routing, theming, internationalization, and a comprehensive UI component library. Perfect for kickstarting your next project!

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Toggle between light, dark, and system themes using next-themes with seamless transitions.

translation.title: Internationalization
translation.description: Multi-language support with i18next. Switch between languages dynamically.

components.title: UI Components
components.description: Showcase of all available UI components built with Radix UI and Tailwind CSS.

toast.title: Toast Notifications
toast.description: You can use this for alerts and confirmations.

dependencies.title: Tech Stack & Dependencies
dependencies.description: This template is built with the following technologies:
